Uses of Class
users.User

  • Packages that use User 
    Package Description
    assignments
    The assignments package contains the necessary files for Assignments, Assignment Submissions, Assignment Solutions, Courses, and Grading.
    files
    The files package is used to manage and maintain files on the server.
    users
    The users package maintains and manages user information for logging in to and using the system.
    utility
    The utility package contains methods and interfaces to be used across the system as needed by many other classes.
